'''0.9.4''' is a [[launcher]] version released on June 18, 2013.

== Additions ==
* Added "New Profile" and "Edit Profile" buttons to the profile selection panel.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-415}} – Won't start if the game directory doesn't exist
* {{bug|MCL-459}} – I can't right click profiles in the profile list
